Name: RATUZ
About the game: After a science experiment gets out of control, you need to survive and escape this dark prison that hides weird secrets. The game is a cinematic platform of terror and stealth, inspired by INSIDE, Another World, Blackthorne and Prince of Persia. Game Features: Immersing horror sci-fi story Dark and tense atmosphere Abominable creatures created in scientific experiments on humans. Rich in history and animations Moments of persecution and stealth Multiple endings Puzzles
